House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on N-(4-(((2-Amino-5-formyl-1,4,-5,6,7,8 -hexahydro-4-oxo-6-pteridinyl) methyl)amino)benzoyl)-L-glutomic acid.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1992, the duty on n-(4-(((2-amino-5-formyl-1,4,5,6,7, 8-hexahydro-4-oxo-6-pteridinyl) methyl)amino)benzoyl)-L-glutomic acid.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on N-(4-(((2-Amino-5-formyl-1,4,-5,6,7,8 -hexahydro-4-oxo-6-pteridinyl) methyl)amino)benzoyl)-L-glutomic acid.
